## Pack.getNFTs() method

Get Pack Reward Data

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getNFTs(packId: string): Promise<PackNFTMetadata[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packId | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;PackNFTMetadata\[\]&gt;

The NFT metadata for all NFTs in the contract.

## Remarks

Get data associated with the rewards inside a specified pack

## Example


```javascript
// The pack ID of the pack whos rewards you want to get
const packId = 0;

const nfts = await contract.getNFTs(packId);
console.log(nfts);
```
